name: ItalianPizzaMaker
0:
”Alexa, ask italian pizzamaker the recipe for neapolitan pizza”
”Alexa, ask italian pizzamaker what is the recipe for two neapolitan pizzas”
”Alexa, tell italian pizzamaker to give me the recipe for ten italian pizzas using a long leavened”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: italian pizzamaker
des: You can decide how many pizzas to make, the type of pizza choosing from italian pizza, Neapolitan pizza and pizza on the pan, providing the temperature of the room, the hydration to be used and the type of leavening time, alexa will calculate the optimal quantity of ingredients for the dough and the right amount of yeast to use.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
